messages.content: Is there a problem with litter in your street or are you fed up with the increasing amount of litter that is to be found in Portsmouth & Southsea? Would you like to do something about it? Why not join the Pompey Litter Pickers which was set up by Flick Drummond in 2013. The aim is to help improve the environment in Portsmouth & Southsea.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Flick Drummond organized the Pompey Litter Pickers to help improve the environment in Portsmouth & Southsea by collecting litter.

mentions.candidate: Flick Drummond organized the Pompey Litter Pickers to help improve the environment in Portsmouth & Southsea.

issues.environment: The leaflet discusses the issue of littering in Portsmouth & Southsea, and outlines the Pompey Litter Pickers initiative set up by Flick Drummond to tackle this problem.

contactInformation.address: Flick Drummond; P.S.C.A Freepost RSGL-CTLR-ZRBA Unit F4, Cumberland Business Centre, Northumberland Road, Portsmouth PO5 1DS

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet is focused on the environmental initiative 'Pompey Litter Pickers' set up by the candidate to address the litter problem in Portsmouth & Southsea.
